Exclusive Display
Full marketing campaign planning and display assistance for tailoring the location-based display of individual brands, such as large dolls, dynamic props, and stylish devices for individual events. Zone-based displays are presented in situated shelves. The exclusively designed dynamic display for focusing on products with music and lighting effect adds fun and joy to malls with comprehensive splendid display effect.
Partnership
Global Markets
Starting from Taiwan, we distribute products to 25 countries including China, Hong Kong, Macao, the USA, the UK, Japan, South Korea, Singapore, New Zealand, and Australia.
Annual Key Marketing Events
We participate in the Hong Kong Gifts and Premium Fair and Hall of Fine Designs in April every year and attract over 10,000 visitor-times and discover worldwide partners.
Global Key Partners
Taiwan: eslite, Kingstone, Books.com, airport duty-free shops (Everrich and Tasa Meng)USA: Leading gift supplier PAPYRUSUK: Gift retailer ClintonsJapan: Sanrio and DESIGNPHIL (Midori)Hong Kong: Long on, eslite.

Join Us

Upholding the maker’s spirit for 40 years, we make continuous product innovation through incessant self-challenges and help our partners to create more business opportunities.Contact Now
